info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 21 at 11:53PM CDT until July 23 at 11:24AM CDT by NWS Wichita KS
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas...
Smoky Hill River At Lindsborg affecting McPherson County.
Smoky Hill River Near Mentor affecting Saline and McPherson Counties.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Smoky Hill River at Lindsborg.
* WHEN...From Tuesday morning to late Wednesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 24.5 feet, The Old Mill Campgrounds are covered by 3 to 4 feet of flood waters.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 23.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don't drown.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon at noon CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING
